message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $11,500 feels fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $10,750? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, could you consider offering the product at $10,500?
